Text: Not that bad of a remake release.  Let me know if anyone would like the original too.
There's no DD 5.1 track. Also, the encoding is XviD, not X264. Xvid shows noise artifacts, at least I can see it. If you follow in HolyRoses' footsteps for format I think you'll get more seeds.

@jake_samuals Your right there is no DD5.1 track just stereo as stated. Dolby Pro Logic is only stereo. As for codec yes it is x264 I already tested on my AppleTv and works flawless.  AppleTv will not play xvid
